data.message: I'd like to formally introduce myself, I'm Reaper. An upcoming singer/song writter and rapper from Houston TX. I've been working on my debut Mixtape " Resurrection" and just recently released my single " The Return". It would mean a lot to me. If some of you would listen to my song and like it ( if you do) and comment ( your honest opinion) and share. Please. The link is here. https://m.soundcloud.com/reaper-tha-kid/reaper-the-return-eng-mi-g
